markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spirit's Anguish](/Feats.aspx?ID=3457) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 23</row>

**Archetype** [Exorcist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=171)

**Cost**
1 spirit wisp or spirit remnant from your  spirit dwelling 

**Prerequisites**
[Exorcist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3454)

**Requirements**
You are holding your _spirit dwelling_.

</column>

---

You purify a spirit by coaxing it to release its anguish in a final cathartic howl. This deals sonic damage to all creatures in a 30-foot cone, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If you expend a spirit wisp, this deals 1d4 sonic damage per level you have. If you expend a spirit remnant, this deals 1d6 sonic damage per level of the [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) or [haunt](/Traits.aspx?ID=88) from which you gained the remnant.
